messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What triggered the Keeper to choose the 'summary option'?
The Keeper rolled 4, which indicates some form of violence.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happened to Harvey while he was alone?
Harvey trashes the room in his search for hidden cameras, listening devices, and speaker units.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much time had passed when Harvey recovered his wits?
At least 3 hours had passed.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the condition of the office after Harvey recovered his wits?
The office looked like a bomb had hit it.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the condition of the security guard on the floor?
He was either dead or unconscious with a bloody wound on his head.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is lying on the floor with a bloody wound on his head?
A security guard thrown in by the Keeper
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is happening to Kratos after failing his Sanity roll?
Kratos loses 5 Sanity points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What result does Kratos get on his Intelligence roll?
He rolls 23 on 1D100, passing his Intelligence roll (INT)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does the Keeper decide Kratos will do next?
Kratos will flee the hotel and head for the train station
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does the Keeper determine to be the result of Kratos's bout of madness?
The Keeper decides Kratos will flee the hotel and head for the train station, boarding the first train for Calais
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when investigators choose to listen to Kratos leaving?
They are allowed a Listen roll to do so.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What control does the player have over the investigator during the Insanity Phase 2?
The player has control firmly in their hands, allowing them to freely choose how to roleplay being insane.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Does the player have to roleplay being insane during the Insanity Phase 2?
No, the player is not compelled to do so.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can aspects of the initial bout of madness be reincorporated during the Insanity Phase 2?
Yes, for the duration of the underlying insanity.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to control of Kratos after the initial bout of madness?
The Keeper hands control of Kratos back to the player.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the player's control during the game?
The player has firm control over the game.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can the player choose to roleplay as insane?
Yes, the player may freely choose to roleplay being insane.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if the player loses Sanity points after the initial bout of madness?
Another bout of madness occurs.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the player's mental fragility after the initial bout of madness?
The mental fragility remains for the full duration.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if the player loses Sanity points during a bout of madness?
The bout of madness repeats.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to investigators if they suffer a bout of madness?
They may be lost in madness and thus not under the player's control for minutes or hours.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the outcome for investigators if a bout of madness happens away from the company of other investigators?
The Keeper can simply fast-forward the action and describe the outcome.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long is an investigator typically not under the player's control after a bout of madness?
1D10 hours, or as the Keeper judges appropriate.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to investigators if all of them suffer a bout of madness simultaneously?
The Keeper can simply fast-forward the action and describe the outcome.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to investigators who suffer a bout of madness away from the company of other investigators or all of them suffer a bout of madness simultaneously?
The Keeper can simply fast-forward the action and describe the outcome.
